description:
TapNote eschews clutter and complexity to make writing a joy:

* Plain text (no distractions!)
* Dropbox sync
* Multiple cards
* Quick Text date insertion
* Just Type support (WebOS 2.0+)
* Rotate for reading mode
* Email documents
* Multiple themes & fonts

Not convinced? Try the feature-limited TapNote Lite for free!

Currently available in English.

SUPPORT & FEEDBACK
Email me at tapnote@onecrayon.com -- ridiculously good support is part of the package.

WHAT'S NEW in 1.3.1:
* Opening a new card from the editing screen works properly again
